trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The esurient Arkasodara is groaning weakly.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the leather coinpurse to Mehryde at Mehryde's Meyhane.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_TODO_01<tab>Inspect the crate of apples.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_TODO_02<tab>Carry the crate of apples to the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the esurient Arkasodara.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_TODO_04<tab>Give the leather coinpurse to Khufiye.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_TODO_05<tab>Hand over the egg-filled sack and the leather coinpurse to the esurient Arkasodara.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_001<tab>Y-You there... Please... T-Take my coinpurse to Mehryde's Meyhane... Buy all the apples you can... So...hungry...
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_002<tab>I have no strength left... Auuugggh... My stomach... To Mehryde's Meyhane... Hurry...
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_003<tab>Be still my growling stomach... Help is on the way...
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_MEHRYDE_000_004<tab>Welcome to Mehryde's Meyhane! What can I─er...is something amiss?
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_MEHRYDE_000_005<tab>Food for the hungry? Worry not─he has more than enough coin for a crateful of apples. Bring it to him with my blessing.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_MEHRYDE_000_006<tab>I'll take what I am owed and leave the rest. Pray return the remainder to him. You'll find the crate of apples in front of the meyhane.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_MEHRYDE_000_007<tab>I am unsure what has sapped your friend's strength so, but perhaps it would be best for you to bring him his apples with haste.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>Carry the apple crate to the designated location before the time runs out.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>You will have 120 seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>You successfully carried the crate to the designated location!
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>The crate crashes to the ground, sending the apples scattering. Sadly, they're unfit for eating now. Return to Mehryde's Meyhane to obtain a fresh batch.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_013<tab>Uuungh... My stomach burns with a thousand fires... Have you the apples?
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_014<tab>The people of Radz-at-Han are so kind. So kind! Many thanks, friend.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_015<tab>You brought me so many apples, but... I'm afraid I'm still too weak to move. My body craves more... More...
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_016<tab>If I could trouble you again... To bring me some hamsa eggs from Nilopala Nourishments... Take my coinpurse... I promise...I will make it up to you...
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_017<tab>Urgh... I'm sorry, friend. I am still too weak to move...
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_MEHRYDE_000_018<tab>...The apples were not enough? But that crate could feed an entire family for days!
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_KHUFIYE_000_019<tab>Welcome to Nilopala Nourishments. What can I do for you?
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_KHUFIYE_000_020<tab>As many eggs as the coin in this purse can buy? Well, you're in luck. I have quite a surplus today. I shall give you the extras so they won't go to waste.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_KHUFIYE_000_021<tab>Here you go! ...And here's a share of your friend's coin back. It would seem he's greatly overestimated the cost of eggs these days.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_KHUFIYE_100_021<tab>It sounds like your friend is in dire straits. By all means, pray deliver his eggs before he collapses from hunger.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_022<tab>You're back! Did you...ungggh...find the eggs?
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_023<tab>Ahhh... My favorite... The yolks just melt in your mouth. My stomach calms, and I feel my stamina return. Thank you so much, friend.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_024<tab>I had been attacked by a strange monster high up in the mountains. I descended as fast as I could, tumbling through brush and tree boughs.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_025<tab>Finally I returned home, but I was so exhausted. I collapsed, only to wake again to the pangs of my empty stomach. But I found I was too weak to get up!

TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_026<tab>Such is the curse of being so large. We Arkasodara have great strength at our disposal, but once that strength is spent, it requires a veritable feast to replenish.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_OOGUIZOU_000_027<tab>You may have whatever coin is left in my purse as a token of my gratitude. You have done me a great service today.
TEXT_AKTKZF017_04272_HAMSAFARMWOMEN00420_000_021<tab>Here you are. Your friend still has plenty of coin left over after your purchase. So I will just hand this back to you.
